name: Example Command Agent
description: Example metadata template for headless minting with command-based workflows.

capabilities.name: example_capability
capabilities.description: Description of what this capability does

commands.description: Description of what this command does

instructions.name: Required: Agent display name (min 3 characters)
instructions.agent_id: Required: Unique identifier (lowercase, numbers, hyphens only)
instructions.image: Optional: Image URL, IPFS URI, or base64 data
instructions.capabilities: Required: Array of capability objects (min 1 required)
instructions.commands: Optional: Array of command objects for user interaction
instructions.taskUnit: Optional: For task-transaction, usually per-query or per-item
instructions.timeUnit: Optional: For time-based-task: second, minute, or hour
instructions.nlp_fallback: Optional: Enables fallback NLP handling for unsupported command inputs
